nodes.text: Bodyservant was the term given to a person whose occupation it was to serve as the personal assistant to a given being, acting on behalf of and in assistance to their master in many ways. A bodyservant was often, but not always, enslaved to the person whom they served. In 11 ABY, Elegos A'Kla voluntarily took up the post of bodyservant to Corran Horn, then masquerading as Jenos Idanian, in order to maintain the Jedi's cover among the Khuiumin Survivors and the Invids that he had infiltrated.
